https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3qxSSpttBohLChNSFApoAWysHic.jpg Unaired 14th episode of Day Break Illusion, broadcast on Nico Nico and included in the 4th Blu-ray and DVD volumes. It shows Akari and Fuyuna's lives prior to the main series as well as how Luna got started as a magical girl. Day Break Illusion: Fumikomenai Kokoro
